body: Animation was good BUT there's my personal nitpick a detail I liked in page 27 was were the teacher grabs her arm by force and push her in the bookshelf, in the animation they cut that part and they are just in the bookshelf, that said it was a good adaptation the second chapter was also good, can't wait for the others!!
fuck yeahh, cant wait for the animation in 2 months

Hentai logic makes this shit sad. In a RL situation/decision, all Shiina had to do when she was in the library while getting railed by Tamura-sensei was to come out to let Tsukino-sensei and exclaim Tamura was raping her and that'd be end of it; but of course there wouldn't be a HENTAI STORY, would it? So yea, animation is coming this October and will be 2 episodes per month from there, up to 6 eps are planned so far, by none other than Bunnywalker (check out their other animations of characters in the same universe, Mako and Chii).
Fun fact: this is getting an animation!
wow a dumb teacher blackmailing a good teacher. that is sad
